name: Old Youtube Layout 2021-2022 (AdaShimaaTube)
description: Please report bugs via my email, github or discussion section(If I have some free time, I'll fix it) Contact: sapondanaisriwan@gmail.com Support me: https://ko-fi.com/sapondanaisriwan
additional_info: If you are currently using Stylish, please switch to Stylus as Stylish does not support the latest version Install Stylus Install AdashimaaTube Install AdashimaaTube Install AdashimaaTube https://i.imgur.com/TA1QUnh.png Recommendation Please turn off ambient mode and enable dark mode for the best result. üí°Features This is why you should consider using Youtube Old Layout! ü•∂ - Revert to the old video container. - Removal rounded edges on video thumbnails and the UI. - Customizable color of Like/Dislike buttons. - Display full title for videos. - Display the videos index in playlists. - Red subscribe button. - Options to Enabled/Disabled Dark Navigation Bars. - Options to remove all text from buttons except the Like/Dislike buttons. - Options to hide the buttons for Share, Download, Clip, and Thanks. üõ†Ô∏èChangeLog All changes to this project will be documented in this file.
